title: Zygor Guide 5.0.14129 World of Warcraft 7.0.3 v
description:
Version: 5.0.14129
+Updated - Starter Zones - Leveling Guides Both
Updated the starter zones for the new update removing the class specific tutorials originally given to players as these quests were removed.
Added support for gnome hunters to the gnome starter guide.

Version: 5.0.14128
GENERAL:
Fix for profession guides macro crash.
Fix for profession guides not detecting skills properly.
Fix: Do Not Replace heirlooms tooltip has been clarified. New options added to specify what heirlooms to replace (with or without bonus xp).
Fix: Points of Interest hiding and tooltips

GOLD GUIDE:
In Patch 7.0.3, Blizzard has made changes to the addon api that has crippled the scanning functionality of the gold guide, and as a result the gold chores and auction tools are not working properly. For the time being we have disabled the Gold Guide until we are able to rework things to work right again.

GEAR SYSTEM
Item score adjustments:
- Windwalker Monks no longer recommended 2 handed weapons.
- Frost Death Knights corrected to only recommend 1 handed weapons.
- Additional armor type adjustments for Hunters, Druids, Paladins, Warriors
